original_text: Other people said, ‘We have to pay taxes to the king for our fields and our vineyards. People had to lend us money to pay the taxes.
korean_text: 어떤 사람은 말하기를 우리는 밭과 포도원으로 돈을 빚내서 왕에게 세금을 바쳤도다

sentences.original_text: 'We have to pay taxes to the king
for our fields and our vineyards.'
sentences.korean_translation: 우리 밭과 포도원에 대한 세금을 말입니다.'

sentences.original_text: People had to lend us money
